sentences.sContent: A few years ago a car fuelled by solar energy would have been inconceivable.
sentences.sCn: 几年前太阳能汽车还是不可思议的事。

sentences.sContent: It is inconceivable that a man in such a powerful position could act so unwisely.
sentences.sCn: 真是难以置信，这么大权在握的人行事竟如此愚蠢。

synos.tran: 不可思议的；难以置信的；不能想象的；非凡的

trans.tranCn: 不可思议的；难以置信的；不能想象的；非凡的
trans.tranOther: too strange or unusual to be thought real or possible
